title: Seeing the Prophet in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the Prophet in a dream: The Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, is the last of the messengers and the beloved of the Most Gracious, and seeing him in a dream is one of the dreams that carries within it all the best for its owner. Explanation of seeing Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace in a dream, in detail in this article. Seeing the Prophet in a dream Seeing the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a person’s dream has many connotations and meanings, which are: Seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream of a man suffering from financial trouble and the accumulation of debts indicates recovery. His financial situation and he will be able to repay the debt in the coming period. Seeing the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream is one of the good dreams that warn the owner of his high status in the afterlife, and eternal bliss and victory in the highest ranks of Paradise. Seeing the Seal of the Prophets and Messengers in a dream for a worker indicates that he He will reach the highest positions in his work because of his mastery and dedication in performing the duties required of him to the fullest. Whoever comes to the Messenger of God with a happy face and appears happy in a dream, his position will rise and he will become strong and reliable in the coming period. If the dreamer is subjected to injustice and oppression in real life, then the vision of the Prophet In a dream, it symbolizes that God will accept his broken heart and return to him all his stolen rights. The dream of seeing the Messenger in a dream in an unpleasant manner, has a clear indication of the path of the dreamer Satan and his distance from God in real life. Seeing the Prophet in a dream to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many things in a dream. Among the hints that express seeing the Messenger in a dream are: If the dreamer sees in his dream the Messenger of God, and he is unjustly punished with imprisonment, then this dream is praiseworthy and portends the emergence of the truth, and he will be released in the near future. In the event that someone is a competitor to one of the people in the field of Certain, but his opponent uses unlawful and illegitimate methods that prevent the dreamer from winning, and he saw the Prophet Muhammad in a dream, so this vision is praiseworthy and indicates that. God will stand by his side and grant him victory in the end. If the dreamer suffers from severe hardships and difficulties and sees Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, in his dream, this is good news that he will change his circumstances from poverty to wealth in the near future. Seeing the Prophet in the dream of an unmarried woman. There are many interpretations Related to seeing the Messenger in a dream, the most important of them are: If the dreamer is unmarried and sees the Messenger of God smiling in a dream, then there is an indication of her fragrant conduct, the purity of her heart, her good morals, and her desire to follow the teachings of the Book of God and the Sunnah of God. His Messenger, which made her win the love of everyone around her. Seeing the Prophet in a dream of a girl who is not a relative means that her future husband will be good and will take care of her and protect her. If the fortuneteller is a girl who has never been married before and she witnesses the Messenger of God and smiles at her, then she will be lucky and God will grant her success and great success. In all areas of her life. If an unmarried woman cannot make a decisive decision about her engagement to a young man who proposes to her, and the Prophet Muhammad comes in a dream, this is a sign that he is the right partner for her and she must agree to him. Seeing the Prophet in a dream for a married woman

title: Interpretation of a ring in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a ring in a dream through the following lines, as seeing rings is one of the dreams that everyone dreams about, especially women, because of its value and everyone’s desire to obtain it, but the dream of a ring is not like that. It was interpreted so that we know the condition of the dreamer and know the details of the vision, and through the following lines in Encyclopedia We will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a ring in a dream in different cases from the point of view of interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a ring in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that if someone sees that he has acquired a silver ring, this indicates Many blessings will arrive for him, and if the ring is made of iron, this is a warning to him against sorrows and worries on the road. For him. As for buying a silver ring, it is evidence of the dreamer’s intention to buy a new home, and if he sees that the ring has many inscriptions on it, this means that he will fulfill many of the dreams and wishes that he desires, and if someone dreams that he finds a ring on the road, then this is good news for him that he will have a child. A child, but if he loses his ring, this indicates the death of his son or the loss of his money. Taking off his ring in a dream is evidence of his intention to divorce his wife, and a woman taking off her ring in a dream indicates the death of her husband. The vision of acquiring a golden ring shows the dreamer’s betrayal and injustice to those around him, and if the ring has two lobes, then this is good news for the dreamer that he will obtain an excellent position. As for breaking the ring in the dream, it is evidence that the dreamer is suffering from sadness, anxiety, and loss of his money, and selling the ring indicates that the owner The dream will divorce his wife quietly and without problems. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing the ring in a dream: The scholar Ibn Shaheen says that the silver ring is evidence of many good things for the pioneer, and if the ring is made of iron, this indicates that the dreamer is committing sins and transgressions, and the engraving on the ring is a sign of the fulfillment of desires. And goals in the future. If he sees that he took off his ring, this means that he will be fired from his job or divorce his wife, and if he sees that his ring is broken, this indicates the loss of his money and the loss of his position. And to see a man wearing a gold ring is evidence of his tyranny and oppression of those around him, and if he sees that he has a large collection of rings, this indicates that a lot of money awaits him. Seeing the ring being transported indicates that the dreamer is serving something that does not belong to him, and as for the rings descending from the sky, it is evidence That the dreamer has a male child, and the sale of his ring is evidence. From divorcing his wife. Interpretation of a dream about a ring by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that a silver ring is a sign of exaltation and kingship, while a golden ring represents sadness and delusion for its owner, and if the ring is made of copper, then this is evidence of the dreamer’s injury, anxiety, and unhappiness. And the fatigue of insight increases most of the ring lobes that he saw in a dream. Interpretation of a dream for a single woman with a ring: If an unmarried woman sees that she got a gold ring and got engaged, this indicates that her engagement is about to collapse, and that she has a diamond ring is evidence of her engagement to someone who holds an excellent position. An engaged girl who broke her ring indicates the end of her engagement. See

preview.html: Dream of illness: This dream has a large number of different interpretations, and these interpretations are different, some of which are good and some of which are opposite, and these interpretations are as follows: When the sleeper sees that he or someone he loves is suffering from an illness in the dream and does not talk to anyone in the dream, this indicates that this The person is close to his death. If this person thinks that he is sick with measles, this indicates that there is a lot of good news that will reach him soon. When the sleeper sees that someone he loves is sick with measles, this indicates that this person will receive a lot of good things. In his next life. If a married woman sees that she is seriously ill. This indicates that her husband loves her very much and fears for her. When a pregnant woman sees that she is suffering from an illness, no matter how severe that illness is. This indicates that this woman is suffering from severe stress in her life. Also It indicates that she is suffering from severe fear due to childbirth. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a serious illness. I dream of illness by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous scholars of interpretation and has a large number of interpretations related to this dream, and among these interpretations are the following: When someone sees that he is sick, this It indicates that all his worries and sorrows that he experienced in his life will end. In the event that this person has measles. This indicates that she will get married in a short time, and it also shows that this woman is from an old family in the country. When this person sees that someone he knows Or a loved one has measles. This indicates that there is a large amount of happy news that will happen to him. If this person sees that he is suffering from cancer. This indicates that he enjoys high health in heart and mind. Interpretation of a dream about a single girl being sick. This dream has a large number of interpretations. Different and important, and most often these interpretations are for this girl, and among these interpretations are the following: When an unmarried girl sees that she is suffering from an illness. This indicates that this girl will enjoy good health during the coming period, and it also indicates that this girl will enjoy beauty. Supernatural.If this girl sees that she is suffering from a serious illness such as cancer. This indicates that she will soon be emotionally involved in her life. When an unmarried girl sees that she is suffering from a high fever or a high temperature. This indicates that she will soon be engaged Read also: Interpretation of a dream about cancer in another person. Interpretation of a dream about illness for a married woman. This dream is often an important dream, as it indicates a large number of happy things that this woman enjoys in her life, and it has a large and varied number of interpretations, and among these interpretations are: The following: When a married woman sees that she is suffering from any illness, no matter how serious it is. This indicates that she is happy with her married life and shows that her husband loves her very much. If this woman sees that she is suffering from a serious illness, this indicates that he will get a lot of money, and indicates It also indicates that he is in good health. Interpretation of a dream about illness for a pregnant woman: People consider that the pregnant woman is the one who fears for herself the most

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a husband with his wife according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband having sex with his wife: Is it good or bad to see a husband having sex with his wife? What are the negative meanings of having sex in a dream? What does a dream about a husband having intercourse with his wife from behind mean? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of the vision of a husband having intercourse with his wife according to Ibn Sirin and the scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a husband having sex with his wife. Scientists interpreted the vision of a husband having intercourse with his wife as a sign of the dreamer’s good condition with her partner and a change in their standard of living for the better. Some interpreters said that A husband having intercourse with his wife in a dream indicates that the dreamer will rise in his work and achieve the highest positions. It is said that a husband’s dream of having intercourse with his wife indicates that the dreamer will soon receive a valuable gift from one of his friends, but if the dreamer sees her partner having intercourse with her during menstruation, this indicates that he will that. He does not pray and he must advise him and guide him to the straight path. Interpretation of a dream about a husband having intercourse with his wife according to Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer dreams that her partner is having intercourse with her against her will, this means that he feels extremely jealous of her and is harming her with his control and domination, and the dream carries a message of separation from him in order to protect her. herself from his harm. Intercourse in a dream may symbolize dealing with some small problems soon, but it will not last long and the dreamer will be able to get out of it easily. Sexual intercourse in a dream symbolizes the birth of a male, and if the dreamer sleeps with her husband in her family’s home, this indicates She falls into a big problem that she cannot solve. Does it refer to the interpretation of a dream about a husband having intercourse with his wife from the back of a pregnant woman? Interpretation of dreams for a husband who has sex with his wife behind a pregnant woman. This indicates that there will be many heated discussions and arguments between them in reality, and she needs to be patient and rational to be able to calm the situation between them. A pregnant woman seeing her husband having intercourse with her in a dream means that she will give birth easily and smoothly without feeling tired or anxious. What is the interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a non-husband for a pregnant woman? The interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a non-husband for a pregnant woman and this person knows, which indicates that she will have many The benefits and benefits of this man actually. Seeing a pregnant woman having sexual intercourse with a man other than her husband, who ejaculates in a dream due to lust, is evidence that she has committed many sins, disobedience, and reprehensible acts, and she must stop them immediately and hasten to repent before they happen. Slowly so as not to throw herself into the hands of loss, serious reckoning, and sadness. Seeing a pregnant dreamer with a man having sex with her from the anus in a dream indicates that she will be exposed to some problems and disputes. If a pregnant woman sees herself having sex with a man other than her husband, this is a sign of the emergence of many The intense discussions and conflicts between her and her husband, and therefore a lot of negative emotions control her, and she must. He must be patient and calm so that he can get rid of all of this. What is the interpretation of a dream about a husband refusing to have sex with his pregnant wife? The interpretation of a dream indicates that a husband refuses to have sex with his wife

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a girl

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a girl: A haircut for a girl who suffers from worries and sorrows is often a harbinger of a significant improvement in her psychology. But if the girl’s hair is long and beautiful, then cutting hair in a dream is often a sign that she has lost someone dear to her. Seeing a haircut in a dream is often a sign that she has lost someone dear to her. Long, soft hair symbolizes this girl’s haste in making the decisions she makes in her life. As for the coarse, curly haircut, it indicates her separation from a young man who was present in her life. Or cutting the coarse hair may be a sign of getting rid of a bad friend in her life or keeping her away from each other. Corrupt personalities. If this girl is in debt, the interpretation of the dream of cutting the girl’s hair in this case expresses the approach to getting rid of these debts. The girl who cuts her tangled hair will succeed in overcoming the difficulties and trials that she is going through. Also, cutting the tangled hair indicates this woman’s repentance. The girl and avoiding the sins she committed in the previous period. And do not forget to read our article about: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a single woman. Cutting hair in a dream for a single woman and regretting it. The remorse of the girl who cut her hair indicates that she committed sins and disobedience, and that she is dissatisfied with herself because of these sins. Also, The sadness of this girl who cut her hair often indicates that this girl is dissatisfied with the life she is currently living. However, if this girl is engaged, cutting her hair and regret indicates breaking off the engagement and feeling remorse afterwards. Or this girl may move away from her loyal boyfriend because of his lack of... He trusts her and feels regret afterwards. Interpretation of a dream about a girl cutting her hair and crying about it. Cutting a girl’s hair and crying often indicates that this girl has made many important decisions in haste and feels regret afterwards. Or that cutting her hair while crying about it is an indication that you are entering into a romantic relationship. A failure causes a lot of trouble for this girl. A girl who studies at this stage and cuts her hair and cries over it may fail in school this year. Or a simple haircut may be a sign of this girl’s inability to reach her aspirations and dreams. Crying over the hair of the girl who cuts it may indicate To the intense pain, sadness, and anxiety that will fill this girl’s life in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about a haircut by someone close to you: If the girl’s hair is dirty or curly and a specific person cuts it, then this person can stand next to that girl to get rid of her rule. Or it may be cut Coarse hair is a sign that this person is providing her with financial assistance to get out of her crisis. Also, someone helping her cut her hair indicates that this person gave important advice to the dreamer. If the lover is the one who cuts the girl’s thin hair, then he should beware of this person; Because he desires her. Or perhaps cutting a famous person’s hair by a well-known girl is an indication of the presence of personal ambitions and interests. This person desires this girl. If this girl gets into an argument with the person who helped her cut her hair, she will end this argument soon. But If that person cuts her hair and looks ugly, her reputation may be tarnished

The girl who is studying at this stage and cuts her hair and cries over it may fail in school this year. Or a simple shave may be a sign of this girl's inability to reach her aspirations and dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a haircut by someone close to you If the girl's hair is dirty or curly and a specific person cuts it, it can This person should stand by that girl to get rid of her judgment. Or cutting coarse hair may be a sign that this person is providing her with financial assistance to get out of her crisis. Also, someone helping her cut her hair indicates that this person gave important advice to the owner of the dream. If the lover is the one who cuts the girl's thin hair, he should beware of this person; because he desires her. Or perhaps cutting the hair of a famous person by a known girl is an indication of the presence of personal ambitions and interests. This person desires this girl. If this girl enters into an argument with the person who helped her cut her hair, she will end this argument soon. But if that person cuts her hair and it looks ugly, her reputation may be tarnished

title: I dreamed of a lion and three birds

preview.html: I dreamed of a lion and three birds, what is the interpretation of this? One of the strange dreams that a person sees is seeing animals in a dream whose meaning or interpretation the dreamer does not know, and among the existing animals one often sees lions in a dream, and seeing birds in a dream is one of the dreams that many people see. the people. Interpretation of a dream about a lion and birds, so follow us. First: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream. A lion in a dream does not bode well, because seeing it in a dream warns the dreamer to be careful because he may be exposed to a serious illness or suffer from injustice. Attacking a lion and defeating it in a dream is good news of the victory that the owner will gain. Insight from his achievement in his life and his salvation from the problems and crises that he is exposed to in reality. But if the lion is able to defeat the dreamer and possess him in the dream, this is a sign of harm and evil that will happen to the pioneer, God forbid, and it may be a sign of the enemy’s victory over the dreamer. As for eating Lion meat in a dream is a sign of benevolence, as it indicates that the dreamer will be able to defeat his enemy and harm him, because it may portend marriage or intercourse, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a single woman: A lion in a dream is a symbol of the enemy who is hiding in the banner and wants to cause her harm. And harm. A single woman’s flight from confronting the lion is a sign of her cowardice and fear. It is also a sign that she is running to confront her problems and not recognize them, and this is negative because she will not be able to get rid of them. Of problems. Riding on the back of a lion in a dream for an unmarried woman is good news about the good that she will achieve and the wonderful position that she will obtain in reality. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a lion in a dream is a sign that she is surrounded by enemies and she must be careful in Her dealings. If a married woman sees that a lion is growing in her house, her dream is good news for the high position that she will obtain. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a pregnant woman: A lion in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that he is suffering from an illness, especially if he sees that the lion is causing him harm or harm, but In the event that he can win over and defeat the lion, this is good news for an easy birth. That he will get rid of the pain and suffering of pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a man: The color black in a man’s dream indicates the enemy who is deceiving him, and it also symbolizes illness due to the yellow color of his skin. The lion in a man’s dream may indicate that he is exposed to a great injustice that he cannot overcome. A man sees a lion in a dream, so he must be careful in his dealings with others. For a man, defeating a lion in a dream is a sign of his freedom from the disease and disorders that he suffers from, and it is also considered a sign of victory over the enemy. Second: Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream Scientists interpret seeing birds in a dream. The dream is considered a sign of the great good that the dreamer will receive and it is also considered a sign of the happiness that the dreamer will enjoy in his life. Since birds love freedom in reality, seeing them in a dream is a sign that...

title: Interpretation of a dream: I was swimming in the sea in a dream and its most important interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: I was swimming in the sea in a dream and its most important interpretations, as it is one of the dreams that the dreamer constantly wonders about the interpretation related to it, as we find that some people have it. Fear and anxiety if they see the sea in a dream, from the terror that the great sea carries, whether in its strong waves or in the sound of shock. Today, through the lines of our article, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea. Interpretation of a dream about I was swimming in the sea. There are many different interpretations that came up with Scientists and jurists, according to the appropriate interpretation related to the dreamer’s vision of swimming in the sea according to the various details contained in the dream, so the interpretation of the dream of swimming in the sea is as follows: The sea in the dream indicates the research and effort in the work that the dreamer undertakes to work to earn a living in life. Man. The dreamer sees that he is swimming in the sea in a dream, and this was about experience and mastery, a sign of his ability to achieve many of his dreams and aspirations that he desires, and he will also obtain the result of his effort and mastery. Receiving a lot of diet. If the dreamer in the sea is a woman, this is a sign that her partner will be calm and therefore her life will be in every way pure, happy and free of problems or even problems. Bathing in the sea for a girl who is not yet married, is a sign that she will soon enter into a relationship New love. Finally, if the sea is clear and calm in the dream, this is a sign that the relationship between the girl will end in marriage. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the sea in his mother’s dream indicates the success and distinction that the dreamer will see in his academic and professional life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion Lions and killing them in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of dreams about swimming in the ocean for a married womanMany details remain in the dream and play a prominent role in its correct interpretation by all means and methods, so that the social status of the dreamer plays an important role and the situation in which the sea is in the dream, whether it is calm or with strong waves, Then comes the interpretation of bathing in the sea for a married woman: an indication of her intimate relationship with her husband. It is also an indication of her husband’s ability to restrain his wife, beyond her great sensual contact with him. Seeing water in a married woman’s dream indicates the husband. If the water is clear, this is a sign of the strength of love and understanding between the spouses. In their divorce or the loss of her husband. See also: Interpretation of dreams about a gift from someone I know in a dream for a single and married woman. Interpretation of dreams about swimming in the sea for a single woman. There are many dream interpreters who have heralded many translation books that have spread widely and are available in the hands of the public for them to turn to in times of need. Swimming is as follows: An indication of the psychological state that the girl is going through at this moment. Her swimming in a calm and stable sea is an example of the stable psychological state that she is experiencing, free of any pressure or tension. Swimming for the girl also shows love. March

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pen in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a pen in a dream: Seeing a pen in a dream indicates an abundance of kindness, an increase in money, an abundance of food, an abundance of knowledge, and the dreamer’s elevation to a prominent position or a promotion in the field of work. There are many types of pens, including colored and pencil, and many people use them. A pen naturally in their lives, or the vision may indicate the challenges that the dreamer faces, but he will overcome these challenges and overcome adversity. A dream of seeing a pen by Ibn SirinoSimilarly, a pen in a woman’s dream indicates the extent of her success in her marital and professional life. Seeing a pen in a dream indicates You are suffering from problems in your marital life. Also, seeing a pen in a dream indicates success and stability in professional life. A pen in a dream is a symbol of a ruler, a sultan, or a scholar. Seeing a pen in a dream also indicates a male boy. Dream of seeing a men’s pen. Seeing a man writing with a pen Blue indicates that he has a source of livelihood. Seeing a pen in a man’s dream indicates his consistency in his work. Seeing a pen in a man’s dream is an indication of his source of income or mind. Dreaming of seeing a pen by a single woman. Seeing a pen in a single woman’s dream indicates the extent of her honesty. It indicates the extent of her honesty. Seeing a pen in a dream also indicates that she will meet the person she wants and will be happy with him. A married woman’s dream of seeing a pen: Seeing a married woman in her dream with a pen is good news for the arrival of good news for her. When she sees a married woman writing with a pen, she will obtain money or property. A pregnant woman dreams of seeing a pen: A vision A pen in a dream indicates the birth of a male child. Other interpretations of the dream of seeing a pen: Seeing a pen indicates quality, generosity, and generosity. Seeing a dreamer cleaning a pencil indicates happy news for the dreamer and his religiosity. Seeing the dreamer with a pen in his hand indicates that he will give birth to a good son. The pen also indicates a new job. Seeing a blue pen indicates stability. Seeing a charcoal pen indicates wealth and status. Seeing a broken pen in a dream indicates a change in the dreamer’s condition for the worse. Seeing my mother writing with a pen despite his ignorance indicates his approaching death. Dreaming of seeing a pen RedSeeing a red pen in a dream indicates the danger surrounding the pioneer and the problems or suffering that may stand in his way. Seeing a red pen in a dream indicates the presence of envious and spiteful people in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a gift of a pencil in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need to support him and give him love and attention. A gift pen to the dreamer can also indicate the cessation of anxiety and distress. A new pen also indicates the fulfillment of desires and the achievement of goals in life until reaching a distinguished position. Dream of seeing a dry pen. Interpretation of a dream about a dry pen can indicate alienation and ingratitude in dealings. A pen comes in a dream From a vision, its meaning changes according to the dreamer and according to the pen. The pen can indicate alienation and cruelty, or it can indicate high status and responsibility. You dream of seeing a broken pen. If you see a broken pen in a dream, it may indicate a short life and sudden death, and God knows best. The Lord warns against returning to God Almighty and closing the pen in Manna

title: Interpretation of seeing an orphanage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an orphanage in a dream, an orphanage is a place to shelter orphans who do not have a home and to see an orphanage in a dream can indicate goodness or it can be a warning or warning of evil occurring. Or for the pregnant woman or the divorced woman in its various meanings. Today, through the Ruya website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing an orphanage in a dream, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us.Interpretation of an orphan’s dream by Ibn SirinSeeing an orphan in a dream indicates the injustice and oppression that the viewer suffers from Seeing the adoption of an orphan child in a dream states that the dreamer is doing good deeds. Seeing a dreamer adopting a child and truly getting to know him indicates the death of one of the child’s parents and him becoming an orphan. Seeing adopting a child in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and problems. Dreaming of an orphan child in a dream indicates that the viewer is exposed to a financial crisis. Seeing a group of orphans in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller is suffering from an illness. Dreaming of an orphan girl, which shows the attachment of his wife, the intensity of her love for him, and the strength of their relationship with each other. Interpretation of seeing an orphanage in a dream. Seeing an orphanage in a dream indicates prison or court. Dreaming of visiting an orphanage indicates a tendency The dreamer visits a hospital or prison. Seeing a fortune teller donating to an orphanage means alms and donations made by the dreamer. Seeing the construction of an orphanage It symbolizes building a special space to address injustices. Seeing the destruction or burning of a house Orphans symbolize the emergence of corruption in the land and the spread of injustice. Dreaming of selling a dead person states that we are eating rights People unfairly. Seeing an orphanage in a dream symbolizes the return of rights to their owners. Interpretation of a dream about an orphan for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman adopted by an orphan in her dream is a sign of engagement and marriage in the near future. Seeing an orphan crying in a single woman’s dream indicates the difficulties she faces in her life as a result of her delayed marriage. Interpretation of a dream about an orphan for a married woman: Seeing an orphan boy in a married woman’s dream indicates the sins and misdeeds of the dreamer. Seeing an orphan in a married woman’s dream shows that her husband and children also need more attention and care. Interpretation of dreams about an orphan in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing an orphan in a pregnant woman’s dreamRemembering that she has a male child. Dreaming of an orphan crying over a pregnant woman indicates problems, difficulties, and crises that she will face in the near future. Seeing a pregnant orphan girl in a dream shows that she will give birth to a daughter. Interpretation of seeing an orphan in a dream. Seeing an orphan adopting a child for a bachelor’s degree. It indicates the imminent conflict between his marriage and his wife’s rapid pregnancy and perhaps the birth of a girl. Seeing adopting a child For a married man in a dream, it indicates his high status and his great source of livelihood if the child is male. Seeing a woman adopting in a dream, for a man, shows his emotional stability with his wife. Seeing adopting a child in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the disappearance of her worries and the alleviation of her pain. Interpretation of seeing an orphan being fed in a dream. Seeing a dream that you are feeding An orphan announces the return of rights to those who deserve them. A dream about an orphan’s kindness indicates tolerance and compassion
